definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: He was supposed to give us advice, but this ideas were airy-fairy ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他應該給我們提些勸告，但他的主意都是不切實際的。

sentences.english: Unpractical expectations make some students disappointed in their college life.
sentences.chinese: 不切實際的期望值使部份學生對大學生活感到失望。

sentences.english: Experts have expressed dismay at the quixotic Soviet-style project.
sentences.chinese: 專家們對這一不切實際的蘇聯式工程項目表示失望。

sentences.english: Those concerns are real - I'm not trying to move away from them.
sentences.chinese: 這種擔心是切實存在的，我並不想逃避。

sentences.english: Indeed, there may be some good news for those who wait, Watters says.
sentences.chinese: 切實其實，對於那些期待的人可能會有好消息。

sentences.english: The other effectively allowing same-sex marriage in the state of California.
sentences.chinese: 二是切實有效地允許在加利福尼亞的同性婚姻。

sentences.english: Through the above, Chinese medicines has proven effective role in NASH rats.
sentences.chinese: 證明攻毒扶正法治療NASH大鼠有切實的作用。

sentences.english: In order to assuage these worries, the meeting must produce tangible achievements.
sentences.chinese: 爲了緩和這些憂慮，會晤必須產生切實的成就。

sentences.english: Their parents are fantasized by myths about education offered in foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 他們的家長對國外的教育抱有不切實際的幻想。

sentences.english: Impartially enforcing the law and effectively safeguarding the legitimate rights and interests of taxpayers.
sentences.chinese: 秉公執法，切實維護納稅人的合法權益。

sentences.english: The author hopes this research will be really helpful for the development of Baisheng town.
sentences.chinese: 希望通過本文能對百勝鎮的發展起到切實可行的作用。

sentences.english: Fifth, take strong measures to enhance nuclear security and reduce nuclear risks.
sentences.chinese: 第五，大力加強核安全，切實減少核風險。

sentences.english: I am in a test module for living in space.
sentences.chinese: 我呆的這個大屋切實下是一個太空生涯實驗艙。

sentences.english: Have you found a suitable way of making-up?
sentences.chinese: 你找到切實可行的化妝法了嗎？

sentences.english: I believe this is a viable way to resume the talks.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這是一個切實可行的復談思路。

sentences.english: Most of us have formed an unrealistic picture of life on a desret island.
sentences.chinese: 我們許多人對於荒島生活都抱着一種不切實際的想法。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
to defend/to safeguard/to protect/to uphold/to maintain
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
